availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: B. F. Brown (Lincoln County carpenter and farmer)

body.p: Hustonville, Lincoln County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Brown. Father of Nannie Brown and Samuel G. Brown. Carpenter in Lincoln County in 1850. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District no. 1, p. 269B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Hustonville, p. 122
